Name: Bikes
Description: One time a guy accidentally knocked those bikes over and Clevis put them in the hospital for weeks. Such colorful, pretty objects cause so much violence.

Name: Bar Sign
Description: Henry Bebop is riding in the sunset  on his pink motorcycle and miniskirt. All the testosterone and estrogen in that picture makes me wonder if it could get itself pregnant.
